Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2012 03:55PM sue25 wrote: Dear Stagefree---when we come into the world --we are crying and everybody is smiling ----but when we die --we are smiling and everbody else is crying.  Please get a copy of   "On Life after Death "   by Elisabeth Kubler Ross MD  To die is the most wonderful adventure you will ever have----get ready for the most unbelievable trip.   Keep the faith dear sister and feel the love of those on this sight----Huge Huggs to comfort you and give you peace !!!!!
Posts.Title: It's OK to cry a little.... stagefree bhd1
